prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_8f2k9x",

  "core_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian",
      "Omnivore"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Air-Fryer Tuna Melt Toastie",
  "description": "Crispy, melty tuna-and-cheddar toastie made fast in the air fryer with pantry staples. Mild, budget-friendly, and ready in minutes.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat air fryer to 180°C.",
    "Finely chop onion and pickles.",
    "Drain tuna well.",
    "In a bowl, mix tuna, mayonnaise, onion, pickles, a squeeze of lemon, black pepper, and a small pinch of salt.",
    "Butter one side of each bread slice (outer sides).",
    "Lay cheddar cheese on the unbuttered side of one slice."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Spread the tuna mixture over the cheddar cheese and top with the second bread slice, buttered side facing out.",
    "Place the sandwich in the air fryer basket.",
    "Air-fry at 180°C for 6–8 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden and cheese is melted.",
    "Rest 1 minute, slice, and serve."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "bread",
      "quantity": "2 slices",
      "preparation": "buttered on outer sides"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tuna",
      "quantity": "1 small can (about 120 g drained)",
      "preparation": "drained"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mayonnaise",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cheddar cheese",
      "quantity": "50 g",
      "preparation": "sliced or grated"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pickles",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1 wedge",
      "preparation": "squeezed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "Pinch"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "Small pinch"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "butter",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "softened"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian",
      "Omnivore"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Egg",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
